item.title: Hybrid LSTM-Transformer Models for Profiling Highway-Railway Grade Crossings
item.description: arXiv:2508.00039v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Hump crossings, or high-profile Highway Railway Grade Crossings (HRGCs), pose safety risks to highway vehicles due to potential hang-ups. These crossings typically result from post-construction railway track maintenance activities or non-compliance wi...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> research, transformer, alignment, arxiv, API | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
